title: Connecting three towns (variation)
text: Given three towns find the point for which the summary distance to all towns is minimal. Wanted are the accurate coordinates ±10-6.InputIn the first line the number T (T < 100) of test cases. Then T lines with the space separated coordinates (integer 0 ≤ x, y ≤ 100) of the three towns.OutputFor each test case the coordinates of the above specified point.ExampleInput:22 2 1 1 2 11 0 0 0 2 1Output:1.788675 1.2113241 0
